ol.li: SHALL conform to Derived CDA Section
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67664?3" EMS Response (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "EMS Response"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] organizer
This organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67480?4" Dispatch delay (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet DispatchDelayType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.50 STATIC
This organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67557?9" Response delay (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ResponseDelayType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.51 STATIC
This organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67558?7" Scene delay (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet SceneDelayType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.52 STATIC
This organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67559?5" Transport delay (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet TransportDelayType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.53 STATIC
This organizer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67560?3" Turnaround delay (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet TurnAroundDelayType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.54 STATIC

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry Contains zero or one [0..1] organizer
This organizer MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69466?1" Dispatch Location Name (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type ST
This organizer MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="52002?3" Dispatch Location Latitude (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ
UCUM units SHOULD be "deg". This may require conversion from a parsed "degree + minutes" representation to a decimal representation.
This organizer MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)

This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ
UCUM units SHOULD be "[mi_i]"

This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ
UCUM units SHOULD be "[mi_i]"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
